‡ National team caps and goals, correct as of 16 June 2021.
Ijeoma Esther Okoronkwo (amụrụ na 27 Machị 1997) bụ onye Naijirịa na-agba bọọlụ nke na-agba ọsọ maka Saint-Étienne na ndị otu ụmụ nwanyị Naijirịa.
A mụrụ Okoronkwo na Abia State ma zụlite ya na Richmond, Texas, United States.
Okoronkwo gara John na Randolph Foster High School, Northeast Texas Community College na Mahadum Lamar.
Okoronkwo mere nke mbụ ya na Naijirịa na 10 June 2021 dị ka onye nnọchi anya nkeji nke 43 na mmeri enyi na enyi na Jamaica.
